availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Harrison County native. Son of William Harden. Married to Nancy E. Bishop Harding in Harrison County on September 27, 1853. Married to Elizabeth B. Harding. Father of James S. Harding, Rhoda M. Harding, and Mary E. Harding. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 26.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994037, Harrison County Marriages.
Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates – Microfilm (1911-1964), KDLA, Roll #7016172, Harrison County Deaths, File #5631.
